message:
All done — no further input needed.

Summary of current state:
- Implemented an efficient solution at /workspace/solution.py (Fenwick tree over adjacency array A; updates toggle up to two positions; queries check if sum==0).
- Created evaluation at /workspace/evaluation.txt assessing the original naive solution.
- Created a test harness at /workspace/tests.py used during verification.
- Verified correctness on the sample and extensive randomized tests; ran a micro-benchmark with N=200k, Q=200k (execution ~1.3s here).

Complexity:
- Time: O((N + Q) log N)
- Memory: O(N)

How to run:
- Provide input on stdin and run: python3 /workspace/solution.py
- Outputs: one line per type-2 query (Yes/No)

Everything required by the task is implemented and validated. Task complete.
